problem.markdown:
0. name = "Tamara" 
1.    
2. score = add_score(190)  
3.    
4. print(name, "your score is", score)  
5.

At which line above should the following add_score() function definition be inserted so the program runs without error? 

def add_score(current):
    return current + 10

(x) line 1 ( ) line 3 ( ) line 5 ( ) any of the above
